1992 he was defeated for reelection, drummed out with the lowest share of the vote for any incumbent since William Howard Taft . In speeches in the months and years after that defeat, President Bush would frequently express his belief that history will be kind to us, despite his rejection by the voters. Like any other Bill Clinton , legacy matters greatly to President Bush , which explains Thursday night's highly choreographed reunion at Texas A&M's basketball arena. to have plenty of laughs at Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell 's expense but now they've been replaced with Michael McIntyre and David Hasselhoff . Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better. "Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added: "For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune."

Eric Schmidt drew fire for responding to a hypothetical question posed at a forum in Washington, DC, about an implant that would let Google Inc. know what its users were thinking. He responded that Google Inc. 's policy is to get right up to the creepy line and not cross it, and an implant would cross the line. He also said that as users voluntarily share information online, it doesn't need users to type in search queries for the company to tailor the results.
